flawed_nl_solution:
John was 39-3=<<39-3=32>>32 years old 3 years ago
So that means in 6 years James will be 32/2=<<32/2=16>>16 years old
So right now James is 16-6=<<16-6=10>>10 years old
So James's older brother is 10+4=<<10+4=14>>14 years old
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 32. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
